excerpt: A warm and comforting bowl of vegan lentil soup that will make you feel full and satisfied.

instructions: In a large pot over medium heat, heat the olive oil.
Add the onions and garlic and sauté for 2-3 minutes until translucent.
Add the cumin and paprika and sauté for 1 minute.
Add the carrots and potatoes and sauté for 5-7 minutes until slightly softened.
Add the vegetable broth, canned crushed tomatoes, and red lentils. Stir to combine.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes until the lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Ladle the soup into bowls and top with chopped parsley.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.
